fastload.button.debug.tooltip: Should debugs be printed in the logs?
fastload.button.render_chunk_radius.tool: Many many chunks in a radius should be prepared and built during pre-rendering? Limited by render distance
fastload.button.server_render_divisor.to: Modify how much the render chunk radius is divided by in servers. Use this when servers are slower than singleplayer worlds.
fastload.button.chunk_try_limit.tooltip: How many times would the same chunk count be allowed to be returned in a row before bailing on pre-rendering
